languages.text: "Резать их надо! Как пустили только на Футфол этот корабль — там же все чумные!"

traits.locale_text: "Резать их надо! Как пустили только на Футфол этот корабль — там же все чумные!"

languages.text: "Just cut their throats already! What were they thinking letting that ship dock at Footfall — they're all stricken!"
languages.original_text: "Резать их надо! Как пустили только на Футфол этот корабль — там же все чумные!"

traits.locale_text: "Just cut them already! What were they thinking letting that ship dock at Footfall — they're all stricken!"
"Just cut them already! What were they thinking letting that ship dock at Footfall — they're all stricken!"
"Just cut their throats already! What were they thinking letting that ship dock at Footfall — they're all stricken!"
"Just cut their throats already! What were they thinking letting that ship dock at Footfall — they're all stricken!"
"Just cut their throats already! What were they thinking letting that ship dock at Footfall — they're all stricken!"

languages.text: 「喉を掻っ切れ！フットフォールにあの船を停泊させるなんてとんでもない――奴らは穢れてるんだぞ！」
languages.original_text: "Just cut their throats already! What were they thinking letting that ship dock at Footfall — they're all stricken!"

traits.locale_text: 「喉を掻っ切れ！フットフォールにあの船を停泊させるなんてとんでもない――奴らは穢れてるんだぞ！」

languages.text: “快割了他们的喉咙！他们到底是怎么想的，居然让那艘船停泊在落脚港？他们都被污染了！”
languages.original_text: "Just cut their throats already! What were they thinking letting that ship dock at Footfall — they're all stricken!"

traits.locale_text: “快割了他们的喉咙！他们到底是怎么想的，居然让那艘船停泊在落脚港？他们都被污染了！”

languages.text: «¡Que los degüellen de una vez! ¿A quién se le ocurre dejar que esa nave atracara en Paso? ¡Ahora están todos infectados!».
languages.original_text: "Just cut their throats already! What were they thinking letting that ship dock at Footfall — they're all stricken!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Que los degüellen de una vez! ¿A quién se le ocurre dejar que esa nave atracara en Paso? ¡Ahora están todos infectados!».

languages.text: « Allez, tranchez-leur la gorge, qu'on en finisse ! Qu'est-ce qui leur a pris de laisser ce vaisseau s'amarrer à Castel ? Ils sont tous pestiférés ! »
languages.original_text: "Just cut their throats already! What were they thinking letting that ship dock at Footfall — they're all stricken!"

traits.locale_text: « Allez, tranchez-leur la gorge, qu'on en finisse ! Qu'est-ce qui leur a pris de laisser ce vaisseau s'amarrer à Castel ? Ils sont tous pestiférés ! »

languages.text: "Schneidet ihnen die Kehlen durch! Wie konnten sie das Schiff auf Footfall andocken lassen? Die sind doch alle befallen!"
languages.original_text: "Just cut their throats already! What were they thinking letting that ship dock at Footfall — they're all stricken!"

traits.locale_text: "Schneidet ihnen die Kehlen durch! Wie konnten sie das Schiff auf Footfall andocken lassen? Die sind doch alle befallen!"

languages.text: "Kesin gırtlaklarını gitsin! Ne akla hizmet o gemiyi Binliman'a yanaştırmışlar! Alayı vebalı bunların!"
languages.original_text: "Just cut their throats already! What were they thinking letting that ship dock at Footfall — they're all stricken!"

traits.locale_text: "Kesin artık boğazlarını! Akıllarını mı kaçırmışlar da o gemiyi Binliman'a yanaştırmışlar! Hepsi hastalıklı bunların!"
